name: Metro Mori
description:
Navigate the public transit system of the afterlife! Talk to the people you meet there!

A game by:

  • Isaac Karth @isaackarth https://ikarth.itch.io
  • Gemma Thomson @RaygunGoth

  • Bradford Dobbs @bradforddobbs
